name: 2022 4th International Conference on Information Technology and Computer Communications
content: ITCC 2022 information: 1\. ITCC 2022 is supported by ACM Singapore Chapter, Singapore Institute of Electronics and some other universities and Societies. 2\. Accepted papers will be published in the ACM Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9682-0), which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). 3\. Prof. Xudong Jiang, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, Prof. Yulin Wang, Wuhan University, China and Prof. Rohaya Latip, Universiti Putra Malaysia, Malaysia will be the keynote speakers.
